Farming emissions: Whole Asparagopsis seaweed effective in methane reduction - study https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/farming-emissions-whole-asparagopsis-seaweed- effective-in-macet-reduction-study/3QUANFUQ5FG4FH2GLPKWTMU2FQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/farming-emissions-whole-asparagopsis-seaweed- effective-in-macet-reduction-study/3QUANFUQ5FG4FH2GLPKWTMU2FQ/ Whole Asparagopsis seaweed cuts cattle methane by 95.6%, outperforming bromoform. Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:01:00 +0000 The study showed whole, dried seaweed reduced methane emissions by 95.6%. Photo / Lucy Penellum
North Waikato scrub fire has burned over 1000ha near Meremere https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/north-waikato-scrub-fire-has-burned-over-1000ha-near-meremere/HKDCQXR6RJB6RJAMVKZARXJIAY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/north-waikato-scrub-fire-has-burned-over-1000ha-near-meremere/HKDCQXR6RJB6RJAMVKZARXJIAY/ Malisha Kumar, Maryana GarciaFire and Emergency says the blaze could take days to control. Tue, 22 Oct 2024 21:58:45 +0000 Fire and Emergency New Zealand crews have started the third day of fighting a large vegetation fire near Meremere, which includes the Whangamarino wetlands. Photo / Fenz
Ammunition disposal sparks Tekapo scrub fire, New Zealand Defence Force says https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ammunition-disposal-sparks-tekapo-scrub-fire-new-zealand-defence-force-says/VQBOSGTQPRH2ZP5XG6LDOENBGY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ammunition-disposal-sparks-tekapo-scrub-fire-new-zealand-defence-force-says/VQBOSGTQPRH2ZP5XG6LDOENBGY/ Ben TomsettThe fire was contained at 6.30pm last night. Tue, 22 Oct 2024 21:57:03 +0000 A planned ammunition disposal at the Tekapo Army Camp by the New Zealand Defence Force sparked a blaze that charred 150 hectares on Tuesday. Photo / George Empson

Tue, 22 Oct 2024 21:39:42 +0000 Animal management rules in Auckland are being reviewed, including a change to limit the number of dogs one person may walk. Photo / Alex Burton

Casketeers’ Tipene Funerals: Woman arrested, charged with misconduct in respect of human remains https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/casketeers-tipene-funerals-woman-arrested-charged-with-misconduct-in-respect-of- human-remains/IP522KL7IVD3FNTZCUZEOFMHIQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/casketeers-tipene-funerals-woman-arrested-charged-with-misconduct-in-respect-of- human-remains/IP522KL7IVD3FNTZCUZEOFMHIQ/ Raphael FranksThe 48-year-old Auckland woman will appear in court this Friday. Tue, 22 Oct 2024 21:18:35 +0000 A woman has been arrested in relation to an investigation into concerns around the treatment of some bodies handled by a former undertaker at Tipene Funerals, owned by Francis Tipene. Photo / Dean Purcell
She Shed Tour celebrates nine years with new venues and 10 new artists https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/she-shed-tour-celebrates-nine-years-with-new-venues-and-10-new-artists/7XG3AJDWGZAIFM5SP6A4B34VAE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/she-shed-tour-celebrates-nine-years-with-new-venues-and-10-new-artists/7XG3AJDWGZAIFM5SP6A4B34VAE/ Kim ParkinsonTicket sales benefit Wainui Beach Surf Lifesaving Club this year.Tue, 22 Oct 2024 21:10:43 +0000 Some of the new artists at this year's She Shed Tour are, standing (from left): Iris Milner, Holly Hutchinson, Judi Murphy, Sophie McLeod, Em Cathcart and Teressa Matthews. Front are founder Cheryl Scott and tour committee member and artist Margaret Hansen. The group are pictured in front of Murphy's pottery studio at Wainui - one of the new venues in this year's tour.

Wildfires: Scrub fire at Tekapo contained, firefighters at fire scene in Waikato https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wildfires-scrub-fire-at-tekapo-contained-firefighters-at-fire-scene-in-waikato/HXNUZMRNEBBS5GNDKUEED3LFEI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wildfires-scrub-fire-at-tekapo-contained-firefighters-at-fire-scene-in-waikato/HXNUZMRNEBBS5GNDKUEED3LFEI/ The Tekapo fire grew to 200 hectares at a planned ammunition disposal.
